ARABIC: تَنزِيلًا مِّمَّنْ خَلَقَ ٱلْأَرْضَ وَٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ ٱلْعُلَى

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: a Revelation from Him who created the earth and the high heavens,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: A revelation from Him who created the earth and the high ascending skies,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: a revelation from Him Who created the earth and the high heavens.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: It is a revelation from the Creator of the earth and the high heavens.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Sent down by One Who created the earth and the lofty heavens.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: A revelation from Him Who created the earth and high heavens.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: A revelation from Him Who created the earth and the high heavens.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: a revelation from Him who created the earth and the high heavens;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: A revelation from Him Who created the earth and the high heavens,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: it is a revelation from Him who has created the earth and the high heavens,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: A down-sent from Him who Created the earth and the heavens high.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: A sending down [of the Revelation] from Him who created the earth and the lofty heavens
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: A revelation from Him Who created the earth and the heavens on high.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: A revelation from Him (Allah) Who has created the earth and high heavens.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: It is a sending down from Him who has created the earth, and the high heavens,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: A revelation from He who created the earth and the high heavens.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: A revelation from He who created the earth and highest heavens,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [20:4] a revelation (tanzīlan, a substitution, standing in place of the [conjugated] verb [derived] therefrom which renders it [tanzīlan] accusative) from Him Who created the earth and the high heavens (‘ulā, the plural of ‘ulyā, similar [in pattern] to kubrā, kubar, ‘large’);
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (A revelation) He says: the Qur'an consists of the words spoken (from Him Who created the earth and the high heavens) He raised them one above the other,
